interactions.description: Tidy up the sofa by straightening the cushions and removing any clutter.

senses.vision: A neat and orderly sofa with cushions perfectly aligned.
senses.smell: The fresh scent of a recently cleaned fabric.
senses.tactile: Smooth, even surfaces of the well-arranged cushions on the sofa.

interactions.description: Disarrange the sofa to a more relaxed, lived-in look.

senses.vision: Cushions tossed about and slight disarray, making the sofa look invitingly lived-in.
senses.smell: The same, unchanged scent of the sofa.
senses.tactile: An uneven array of cushions and throws on the sofa.

interactions.description: Change the TV channel to 0.

senses.vision: The TV is playing the current news around the world.
senses.sound: An anchorman discusses the latest trends in artificial intelligence.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

interactions.description: Change the TV channel to the music channel.

senses.vision: The TV is playing colorful music videos which are flashing on the screen.
senses.sound: Dynamic pop tunes and catchy melodies play loudly.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

interactions.description: Change the TV channel to the sitcom channel.

senses.vision: A popular sitcom is playing on the TV, characters laughing and interacting.
senses.sound: Laughter tracks and witty dialogues fill the air.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

interactions.description: Change the TV channel to the sports channel.

senses.vision: The TV is playing a live sports event showcasing a thrilling soccer match.
senses.sound: The crowd's cheers and the commentator's energetic voice can be heard.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

interactions.description: Change the TV channel to the game show channel.

senses.vision: The TV is playing a game show with contestants solving puzzles and answering questions.
senses.sound: Sounds of buzzers, applause, and the host's engaging questions.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

interactions.description: Turn the TV on.
Turn the TV off.

senses.vision: A large flat-screen TV mounted on the wall. The TV is switched off.
senses.tactile: Cold and smooth surface.

senses.vision: A spacious living room with large windows
senses.sound: A constant low hum from an air conditioner
senses.smell: Freshly brewed coffee
senses.tactile: Smooth, cool wooden floors underfoot

interactions.description: Open the refrigerator to look inside.

senses.vision: An open refrigerator having shelves stocked with various food items.
senses.sound: The loud hum of the refrigerator.
senses.smell: A cool blast of air brings a mix of scents.
senses.tactile: The refrigerator's cool air touches your face.

interactions.description: Close the refrigerator.

senses.vision: A refrigerator with its doors shut.

interactions.description: Turn on the stove to start cooking.

senses.vision: The stove is ignited and the burner glows red.
senses.smell: A cooked meal of a robust and savory flavor, with the pungent intensity of garlic and the subtle sweetness of onions enhancing the rich, umami taste.
senses.tactile: Heat radiates from the stove top.

interactions.description: Turn off the stove after cooking.

senses.vision: A shiny, modern stove with pots on it. The stove is turned off.
senses.smell: The lingering smell of cooked food.

senses.vision: A bowl filled with fresh, colorful fruits
senses.smell: The sweet fragrance of ripe fruits
senses.taste: The refreshing taste of mixed fruits
senses.tactile: The soft texture of ripe fruit skin

senses.vision: Modern appliances and a marble countertop
senses.sound: The sizzle of something frying on the stove
senses.smell: Garlic and onions cooking
senses.tactile: Warm air filled with steam from boiling water

interactions.description: Neatly make the bed.

senses.vision: Neatly made bed, with all the sheets and pillows in perfect order.
senses.smell: The fresh scent of clean linen.
senses.tactile: The smooth texture of the bed sheets.

interactions.description: Disarrange the bed to make it messy.

senses.vision: Messy bed with sheets and pillows strewn about.
senses.smell: The unchanged air of a used bed.
senses.tactile: The disordered, crumpled texture of the bedclothes.

interactions.description: Open the wardrobe to see your clothes.

senses.vision: A large, open wooden wardrobe revealing rows of neatly hung clothes.
senses.smell: A hint of cedar and mothballs emanating from within the wardrobe.

interactions.description: Close the wardrobe.

senses.vision: A large wooden wardrobe with its doors closed.
senses.smell: The slight scent of cedar and mothballs.
senses.tactile: The smooth texture of polished wood.

senses.vision: A cozy room with muted lighting
senses.smell: A faint scent of lavender
senses.tactile: Carpeted floors providing a soft footing

interactions.description: Turn on the shower to take a bath.

senses.vision: A glass shower stall with water spraying from the showerhead.
senses.sound: The sound of water splashing against the floor and walls.
senses.smell: The aroma of soap and steam filling the air.
senses.tactile: Warm water cascades over your skin.

interactions.description: Turn off the shower after use.

senses.vision: A glass shower stall with running water.
senses.smell: The lingering scent of soap and steam.

interactions.description: Turn on the sink to start water flow.

senses.vision: A clean, white porcelain sink with water gushing out of the faucet, creating a swirl in the sink.
senses.smell: A misty scent of clean water.
senses.tactile: The cool splash of water.

interactions.description: Turn off the sink to stop water flow.

senses.vision: A clean, white porcelain sink.
senses.smell: A clean, almost clinical scent.
senses.tactile: The damp surface of the sink.

senses.vision: Well-lit with tiled walls
senses.sound: Echoes of movements and water usage
senses.smell: Fresh and sanitized
senses.tactile: The cool, smooth surface of the tiles

senses.vision: A tall oak tree providing shade
senses.smell: The earthy scent of bark and leaves
senses.tactile: The rough texture of the tree bark

senses.vision: Colorful tulips and daisies
senses.sound: Bees buzzing gently from flower to flower
senses.smell: The rich aroma of fresh earth and flowers
senses.tactile: The rough texture of leaves and softness of petals

senses.vision: A lush green garden with a small pond
senses.sound: Birds chirping and water gently rippling in the pond
senses.smell: Fresh grass and damp soil
senses.tactile: Grass underfoot, moist and springy
